description:
Lina can`t regain her magical power and gets depressed. Then she notices a signal fire going up in Sayloon kingdom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aux portes des ténèbres (La Laguna Blade coupe en deux)
Semarikuru Yami no Koe! Kirisake Ragna Blade!
Voci din întunecime / Fă-i bucăţi spadă Ragna
Voices of Darkness! Slash `Em to Bits, Ragna Blade!
Голоса из тьмы! Руби их, Рагна Блэйд!
迫り来る闇の声! 切り裂けラグナ・ブレード!
